pressToStart.name: Push to start
pressToStart.description: When enabled, the car can be started by double-clicking your button to move forward, and then displays the screen to adjust gear and other things

automaticGearbox.name: Automatic gearbox
automaticGearbox.description: When enabled, double-clicking your button to move forward will put the car in DRIVE gear, and double-clicking your button to move backward will put the car in REVERSE gear. When combined with Push to start, the car will start and shift directly into the specific gear

debug.name: Debug
debug.description:
Enable debug mode

If you don't know what this does, don't ask and don't enable it under any circumstances...
